Package com.gsma.mobileconnect.r2.cache

Interface Summary
ICache Interface for the cache used during the discovery process, cache is mainly used to cache DiscoveryResponse objects but can also be used to cache any data used during the Discovery process.
ICacheable Interface for cacheable objects.
 

Class Summary
AbstractCache Base class for Discovery Caches that implements basic cache control mechanisms and type casting reducing the amount of implementation needed in each derived cache class.
AbstractCacheable Defines core functionality of cacheable items.
ConcurrentCache Concrete implementation of ICache using a ConcurrentHashMap as the internal caching mechanism.
ConcurrentCache.Builder  
 

Enum Summary
CacheAccessException.Operation  
 

Exception Summary
CacheAccessException Describes a problem accessing the cache.
CacheExpiryLimitException Thrown to indicate invalid attempt to set cache configuration.
